title: Irelia deserves a better skin: party pool skin
body: Seriously, don't u guys consider that Irelia can have a **surfboard **on her hand? {{champion:39}} So far Irelia's skins are too bad, especially the new one.

replies.body: Frostblade and Order of the Lotus are great skins...
Yea but we want greater skins, particularly, a 1350 RP or higher tier skin for Irelia. She only has one 975 RP skin and the rest are 750 / 520 RP.

It would be difficult to do a 1350/1820 Irelia skin that meets the standards required for them as she is not a particle heavy champion.  Pretty much the only particle that can really be changed is her ultimate, which is limited in what it can be changed to.  Unless she gets a rework that gives her one or two more unique attack animations, the likelihood of her getting a higher tier skin are slim
Nightblade is pretty nice as well.

Hey NoCanBieBB,

Sorry to hear you're not excited for the new Irelia skin. 

I think Pool Party Irelia could be a neat idea. Others have suggested some kind of pool toy for the weapon, but I think there's a lot of possibility for a skin like this. 

As you've seen with several lines - most recently Pool Party - we don't limit ourselves to five champions (team comp), which means, just because it hasn't happened yet, doesn't mean it's off the table for the future. :]
We are still waiting for that Brorelia skin :|
Hijacking topic for a second, but what do you think about a Keyblade Irelia skin? Serious, a skin that pays homage to Kingdom Hearts could fit Irelia PERFECTLY.
I'm anxiously awaiting the day you guys release Pool Party Irelia. I have some RP reserved.
Frostbutt is awesome and order of the lotus is nice as well.  I'd get the second if I didn't have the first already.
Cost for one reason.  I can use only one at another for another reason.
